channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- public node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- public node module

item.title: CVE-2018-3731|2024-08-05T04:50:30.499Z -- hackerone -- public%20node%20module
item.description: public node module suffers from a Path Traversal vulnerability due to lack of validation of filePath, which allows a malicious user to read content of any file with known path.
